name: Subnautica: Seamoth Adventure
description:
Subnautica: Seamoth Adventure is an endless shoot-em-up game, a fan-made game based on Subnautica by Unknown World.

You are the only survivor from the crash of the Aurora on Planet 4546B. You need to find a way to get out of this planet and with Altera's technology, you are able to build a rocket from materials available on the planet and go home. However, you are infected with Kharaa Bacterium on the planet and you need to find a cure before leaving. The path is not easy, there are predators waiting for you. The deeper you go, the more secret you will find.
